text: Oni skazali drug drugu: "Raz vy otreklis' ot svoyego naroda iz-za yego neveriya i priverzhennosti k mnogobozhiyu, ukroytes' v peshchere, ubezhav ot nikh, chtoby spasti vashu religiyu. Togda vash Gospod' nisposhlot vam Svoyu milost' i proshcheniye, oblegchit vashu uchast', pomozhet vam i khorosho ustroit vashe delo
